structure.unit: B MEDICAL IMAGING, RADIATION THERAPY, AND RELATED OCCUPATIONS

text.section: The board shall assess civil penalties authorized by KRS 311B.190 against an individual or licensee who performs diagnostic or therapeutic procedures without a valid license.
Civil penalties, double the amount assessed against the licensee, shall also be assessed against the employer of the individual without a valid license pursuant to subsection (3) of this section.

law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 18, effective July 12, 2012.
